author: Ross Burden
method: Place the teabags and whisky into a bowl with the boiling water and infuse for one minute. Add the prunes and leave to soak for five minutes. Remove the teabags and pour the prunes and liquid into a tall dessert glass. Pour over the melted chocolate, then add the whipped cream to fill the glass. Garnish with a mint sprig and serve.
ingredients: 100ml/3½fl oz boiling water,  2 English Breakfast teabags,  50ml/2fl oz whisky,  150g/5½oz dried prunes, stones removed,  50g/1¾oz chocolate, melted ,  100ml/3½fl oz double cream, whipped,  mint sprig, to garnish
